alert.note: Alert for Casper Mountain; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 14 at 2:09AM MST until February 15 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph, mainly Tuesday evening. * WHERE...Natrona County Lower Elevations and Casper Mountain. * WHEN...From noon today to 5 AM MST Wednesday. Snow will start over northern portions of the county around 12 PM, reaching the Casper area/Casper Mountain between 2 PM and 5 PM. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Casper Mountain; Natrona County Lower Elevations
